sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' function SearchResultItem(props) { const { item } = props const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(false) function handleButtonClick(e) { console.log('button in pressed') setIsExpanded(!isExpanded) } function onTagInputAreaChange(e) { console.log(e.target.value) } return ( <>

{item.name}

Full Name : {item.biography.fullName}
Race : {item.appearance.race}
Alignment: {item.biography.alignment}
Publisher: {item.biography.publisher}
{isExpanded && (

Powers

Intelligence: {item.powerstats.intelligence}
strength: {item.powerstats.strength}
speed: {item.powerstats.speed}
durability: {item.powerstats.durability}
power: {item.powerstats.power}
combat: {item.powerstats.combat}

Tags

onTagInputAreaChange(e)} />
{/* // map the input tags */}
tags are here
)}
) } export default SearchResultItem
